data.description:
Endless Runner meets Cinematic Horror. Awaken from cryo-stasis to live out your nightmare, as you navigate the futuristic corridors full of deadly traps. Experience the only Horror-Themed Endless Runner that lets you Stop! Now with a brand-new flamethrower weapon, in addition to selectable checkpoints, and multiple difficulty settings!

Featuring simple controls: Press the touchpad to move forward. Use your light to guide the way. Let go of the movement button at anytime to stop. After reaching Checkpoint 4, hold down the trigger button to fire your flamethrower weapon. Game controls and difficulty settings can be changed during the loading sequence.

Pro Tips: In most rooms, there are only two paths you can take. If going right kills you, try going left. If running kills you, try stopping, and vice versa.

"Fear Incarnate" means "Fear in the Flesh". The only flesh this game can access, is yours.

Requires: 3DOF controller. This game features Oculus Go App Compatibility on Quest!

changelog.change_log:
-New balance changes
-New Flamethrower weapon is unlocked after checkpoint 4
-It is now more effective to tilt your head near horizontal lasers
-More ghosts have been added!
-New room variations were added to the later checkpoints
-No more punishment for standing still
-Minor compatibility changes for Quest

-New balance changes
-New Flamethrower weapon is unlocked after checkpoint 4
-It is now more effective to tilt your head near horizontal lasers
-More ghosts have been added!
-New room variations were added to the later checkpoints
-No more punishment for standing still

-New Flamethrower weapon is unlocked after checkpoint 4
-It is now more effective to tilt your head near horizontal lasers
-More ghosts have been added!
-New room variations were added to the later checkpoints
-No more punishment for standing still
No Punishment Week Continues! New A8 improvements added.
No Punishment Week Returns!
Welcome to the Easy Difficulty Update. New balance changes have been added to multiple rooms.
New Easy Difficulty mode has been added, and can be selected during the loading sequence (right after you select your starting checkpoint).
Added new performance improvements for the Exynos chipset, as well as various balance changes in the later checkpoints.
Welcome to the balance update. Multiple traps and multiple rooms have been altered and improved. New graphical quality added for S8 devices.
New Gear VR support added for S6 and above. Multiple balance changes added to the later checkpoints.
New Gear VR support added for S6 and above. Multiple balance changes added to the later checkpoints.

No Punishment Week Continues! The game is now slightly easier with selectable checkpoints and a skippable intro sequence. (both features are automatically unlocked upon successful reach of Checkpoint 1)
No Punishment Week Commencing. Minor room changes and balance updates have been added.

-Fire traps are now slightly easier to avoid
-Various balance changes were added to the later checkpoints

-Multiple balance changes have been added to the first 4 checkpoints.
-Ghost AI and punishment rules have been altered in preparation for the upcoming Game Modes.
-Progress Reset and Progress Restore is coming soon in the next major update!

-Welcome to the Balance Update
-Ghosts timings and locations have been altered
-Laser movements and speeds have been modified
-New voice samples added for later checkpoints
-Punishment for stopping is now more severe
-Ghost at 53 seconds is now less evil
-New keyboard-screens added to display your Old Record
Added new automatic progress saving via the Checkpoint System. All camera yaw motion has been eliminated to maximize player comfort.
New balance changes have been added to rooms 5, 7 and 18. Slight balance changes added to "The Shadow". Checkpoint system will be added in the next major update. New game modes will soon follow.
Footstep volume has been lowered. Various balance changes have been added to the later rooms. Checkpoint system will be added in the next major update. New game modes will soon follow.
Loading sequence is now faster. Minor balance changes have been added to the first 3 rooms. Checkpoint system will be added in the next major update.
